document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

Comments. No exact locality information from Iran is available for this species. Occurrence of this species in Iran is doubtful and needs further confirmation.
